item.description: Name: Boa Hancock P.O.P Limited Edition Ver. BB_SP Character: Boa Hancock Category: Limited Edition Sculptor: Inada Motoki Official price: 8650 ¥ Preorder date: Aug-17 Release date: Dec-17 Height: 19 (L) (cm) Weight: Box size: 20.0 x 23.8 x 17.0 (cm) Bonus: En principio la figura se llamó Boa Hancock P.O.P Limited Edition Ver. BB_SP, luego pasó a llamarse Boa Hancock P.O.P Limited Edition Ver. BB_02.<br>Finalmente salió a la venta como Boa Hancock P.
